extraction.sentence: In 2017, Amazon acquired Whole Foods Market for US$13.4 billion, which vastly increased Amazon's presence as a brick-and-mortar retailer.

(; February 24, 1955 – October 5, 2011) was the chairman, chief executive officer (CEO), and co-founder of Apple Inc.; chairman and majority shareholder of Pixar; a member of The Walt Disney Company's board of directors following The Walt Disney Company's board of directors acquisition of Pixar; and the founder, chairman, and CEO of NeXT.
Richardson is a principal city in Dallas and Collin counties in the U.S. state of Texas.
